description: This course is going to reveal the secret DOS commands which are used to perform the Advanced Operations on the System . From this course students will learn to manage known & unknown processes , To Manage hard disk to improve Performance , Trick to Recover corrupted Hard Disk / Pen drives / Memory Card , Learn to use command redirection Operators , Learn to Hide files / folders in such a way that no one can find in windows , Learn to gather system information about local as well as remote Machines , Monitoring the known & unknown Active Internet services in Depth , Administering the Network services , Interacting with windows Registery , Interacting with Windows NT service controller and services , Learn to using the task schedulder , Learn to access PC Remotely , Audting your PC for Computer viruses and Hackers Attack .
title: Unrevealed Secret Dos commands for Ethical Hackers
